author: billynick
name: greybiance
description:
allright so a new theme from me. basically a mod of my old one frostymint

id like to think its a little more refined but there might be bugs. but personally im very happy with it. the colours are inspired by the hope gtk theme by grvrulz and the ubuntu ambiance theme (yes im an ubuntu refugee that couldnt cope with unity and loves cinnamon)

included is also a modded gtk and metacity theme based on the hope gtk theme mentioned above. i think this gtk/metacity matches the cinnamon theme very nicely

also the wallpaper in the screenshot it mint tagline by EldiS82 where ive modded it in gimp by adding a new layer in a  shade of green and used the 'multiply' layer mode

 

a better screenshot can be found here - i wasnt able to get the full size png below 1mb (note this hasnt been updated)

 

NOTE: im using font text scaling factor 0.9 in cinnamon-settings >fonts>text scaling factor

 

changelog:

2.0: gtk theme should work with maya/precise now. other fixes and tweaks

2.01: - a bit of transparency (actually added in 2.0 but forgot to mention)

-cinnamon text and applet colours now match better

-cinnamon and gtk theme colours now match much better

-removed a tiny blue border around applets that i hadnt noticed before due to not wearing glasses!

-improved applet hover (partly done in 2.0)

-probably more but cant remember

2.02: made the applet hover colour lighter and easier to see
